## Training philosophy

At ValidMind, we believe in learning by doing. Our training approach combines:

- Interactive hands-on experience
- Scenario-based learning
- Role-specific workflows
- Real-world applications
- Continuous support and guidance

## Learning paths

Our structured learning paths guide different user personas through their ValidMind journey, from initial onboarding to advanced techniques. Each path is tailored to specific roles and responsibilities, ensuring users gain relevant skills and knowledge.
